text: Peue hana taeu na saboh bahgi Bani Israil masa nyang sudah Watee Iheuh Musa awak nyan dilee Jiyue meulakee bak Nabiyullah Neukiremraja sidroe keu kamoe Meujak prang jinoe nyang musoh Allah Kheun nabi kadang ‘oh geuyue meuprang Ka tajak riwang han tatem susah Jikheun pakri han tatem jak meuprang Abeh jisimbang tanyoe jipisah Ka jipeuteubiet tanyoe di gampong Ngon aneuk kandong teuh pih jipisah ‘Oh ban ka wajeb geuyue jak meuprang Ka laen padan teuma jipeugah Abeh jisurot dum ka jijakwoe Tinggai padum droe nyang na got tuah Tuhan Neuteupue sipheut si lalem Jipubuet laen laen jipeugah
